I'm a software engineer at [Posit](https://posit.co/) working on improving R and the [tidyverse](https://tidyverse.org/).

I've created / maintained a number of R packages:

-   [dplyr](https://dplyr.tidyverse.org)
-   [tidyr](https://tidyr.tidyverse.org)
-   [vctrs](https://vctrs.r-lib.org)
-   [furrr](https://furrr.futureverse.org)
-   [slider](https://davisvaughan.github.io/slider)
-   [clock](https://clock.r-lib.org)
-   [almanac](https://davisvaughan.github.io/almanac)
-   [hardhat](http://hardhat.tidymodels.org)
-   [workflows](http://workflows.tidymodels.org)
-   [probably](https://probably.tidymodels.org)
-   [yardstick](https://yardstick.tidymodels.org)

I'm a core contributor to [Ark](https://github.com/posit-dev/ark), the Jupyter Kernel, Language Server, and Debug Adapter for R. Ark powers the R tooling for [Positron](https://positron.posit.co/), Posit's data science focused IDE.

I'm also the co-creator of [Air](https://github.com/posit-dev/air), a popular R code formatter.
